title: League Lag
body:
Ever since Patch 6.3 I've been lagging non stop and it has come to a point where I have had enough
Being one whom plays several games and not experiencing any lag on any of them(several of which are on NA servers cause they don't have OCE servers)
But only experiencing lag when I play League is rather infuriating

replies.body:
I can forward this to some of the **Wrenchmen** but first I'll need to make sure you've tried everything here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8idjE7Pd-4U

and it would also be super helpful if you looked through everything [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Also just to be clear, this is a ping issue right? Not FPS lag?
